QuestData.Title: Wanted! Marez Cowl
QuestData.Description: A bounty has been placed on the head of Marez Cowl, a high-level advisor and operative of the Syndicate. She was last seen within the Syndicate controlled territory of Stromgarde.$B$BBounty may be collected from Captain Nials.$B$BBe warned: Marez is a skilled and cunning warlock, known for her trafficking with demons. Extreme caution is advised when hunting her.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring Marez's head to Captain Nials at Refuge Pointe.
QuestData.CompletionText: Greetings, $c. You have a report to make?
QuestData.RewardText: You took down Marez Cowl? Well done, $n. Well done indeed!$B$BMarez menaced our Stromgarde defenders, and it is rumored she was an emissary between the Syndicate and some other, darker power. We are glad to see that she'll no longer ply her powers against us.
